original_text: Always try to agree and to be friends with each other. Do not be proud. Be friends with people who are not important. Do not think that you know everything.
korean_text: 서로 마음을 같이하며 높은 데 마음을 두지 말고 도리어 낮은 데 처하며 스스로 지혜 있는 체 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: and to be friends with each other
Be friends with people who are not important
Do not think that you know everything
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 모든 것을 안다고 생각하지 말라
